name: On-Demand Somm
description: ON-DEMAND-SOMM is a platform for wine enthusiasts to record their tasting notes.
technical: Designed, developed, and deployed front and back-end. ON-DEMAND-SOMM is a responsive, React, and Ruby on Rails web application. A platform for wine enthusiasts of all levels to log comprehensive tasting notes and keep track of their beverage experiences. Full CRUD capabilities
languages: JavaScript, React, Ruby, Ruby on Rails, CSS, Axios, React-Router-Dom, Auth, BCrypt, JWT

name: Weather-Now
description: Weather-Now allows users to input their city name and retrieve current weather information.
technical: Worked with the OpenWeather API, created an async function that fetches weather data from third party API. Weather-Now is a responsive application for mobile and tablet screen sizes.

name: Pets-R-Us
description: *Collaboration* Notable contributions: I implemented the create functionality as well as designed the introduction video. Overview: Pets-R-Us is a full (Mongo/Express/React/Node) MERN stack application that allows local animal adoption agencies to post their adorable animals. Every year, thousands of animals are displaced and live without a home. It is our belief that every pet deserves a home. The following is a list of the features: our application has full CRUD on the back, and utilizing the React framework on the front end.

name: ChandlerManly.com
description: Personal Website using React for the front-end and flexbox for styling.

name: Blog App
description: Collaboration: my contribution was on the create post page functionality and styling. Deployed via netlify.

name: Oui Chef!
description: A web-application where users can contribute personalized recipes.
technical: Airtable for back-end DB, full CRUD, React, components and life cycle methods, props and state, React Router

name: Healthy Smoothies
technical: Full CRUD web application. API call to Airtable database.
